system.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.I18nTKFofUw4ewsT]{Fill Your Belly}, you may instead spend 1 Food to brew a potion. It has 1 Use when brewed, and a potion's effects are never permanent. You can create a basic Healing Potion (1 Use, Healing), or something a bit more unusual. When brewing an unusual potion, describe what it looks like, tell us what it does, and then choose two:

  • It is a cream and must be applied; it has the Slow tag.
  • It gets the imbiber Drunk.
  • It is expensive - spend 1 Use of anything to finish it.
  • It has a weird side effect, which you'll discover when you drink it.
